name: Plastic Chairs
description:
In "Plastic Chairs", you play as a traveler who has just arrived at a forest in their car. As you explore your surroundings, you come across a small cabin in the woods. However, it soon becomes clear that something is very wrong with this place, as you are stalked by a malevolent creature that seems to be lurking in the shadows.

With graphics reminiscent of the PSX era, "Plastic Chairs" offers a tense and atmospheric horror experience. Can you uncover the secrets of this eerie cabin in the woods? Or will you become the latest victim of the mysterious entity that lurks within? Play "Plastic Chairs" now and find out.

Throughout the world of "Plastic Chairs", there are hidden notes waiting to be discovered. However, it's up to the player to figure out how to activate these notes  and reveal their secrets. You'll need to explore every nook and cranny of the game world to find them all, but the secrets they contain are worth the effort. So keep your eyes peeled and your wits about you, and see if you can uncover the truth behind the horrors of "Plastic Chairs".
